Name: Running into the Cyberpunk
About the game: You found yourself in the future where robots have taken over the world. As the woman protagonist, you are trying to escape the robots. In this endless run, you jump from platform to platform. First, the turrets, then the first ship that rains projectiles, then the second shop shoots at you which feels endless, and lastly the drone when all of them fail. In the end, all of them attack you. How long could you survive while trying to escape them?
